title: Use the formula
text: First, use the formula for Cramer's rule to solve for $$x$$ and $$y$$. If using a 2x2 matrix, the formula for it is $$x=(\begin{bmatrix} c1 & b1 \\ c2 & b2 \end{bmatrix})/(\begin{bmatrix} a1 & b1 \\ a2 & b2 \end{bmatrix})$$ and $$y=(\begin{bmatrix} a1 & c1 \\ a2 & c2 \end{bmatrix})/(\begin{bmatrix} a1 & b1 \\ a2 & b2 \end{bmatrix}$$.
